DOC.brief_summary: This 36 week open-label extension canakinumab pre-filled syringe study safety tolerability patient frequent flare acute gouty arthritis .
DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Safety Tolerability Canakinumab Prefilled Syringes Frequently Flaring Acute Gouty Arthritis Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Compliance completion canakinumab PFS core study Unchanged significant clinical medical history entry core study Exclusion criterion : Physician judgment unsuitability study Pregnant nursing woman Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
